meanings: (넓이·길이 등을) take, measure, gauge, (무게를) weigh, (수심을) sound, (지형·수심 등을) survey, (시간을) time
(따져 보고 헤아리다) (평가하다) judge, measure, (계산하다) calculate, (헤아리다) guess, (고려해 보다) take sth into consid...
show off, (으스대다, 뽐내다) brag (about/that), boast (of/about/that), be puffed up

vlive.korean: 키 재네 - 이래서 진환이 형 빠졌구먼! We're going to measure the height. - That's why Jinhwan is missing! 듣기 View video iKON : iKON - ‘자체제작 iKON TV’ EP.6-4
vlive.english: We're going to measure the height. - That's why Jinhwan is missing!

vlive.korean: 되게 오래 재네. - 됐다. It measures a lot. - It's done. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] PENTAGON X Happiness Train - 펜타곤​​의 행복행!
vlive.english: It measures a lot. - It's done.

vlive.korean: 맞아 맞아 맞아 [청천벽력] - 지금 그램을 잰 게 아니야? [Surprised] - Right. - So, we didn't weigh that? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.5
vlive.english: [Surprised] - Right. - So, we didn't weigh that?

vlive.korean: 이걸로 잴까요 아니면 이걸로 잴까요? Should it be this or this? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.92
vlive.english: Should it be this or this?

vlive.korean: 이걸 어떻게 재야지 실감이 날까? How do I measure this? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 심야동방🌜 #2

examples.korean: I need to have my blood pressure taken. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 (간호사 등에게 시켜) 혈압을 재어 보아야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: One reason doctors take temperatures is to cover themselves against negligence claims. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 의사들이 체온을 재는 이유 하나는 직무 태만 주장에 대비해서 스스로를 방어하기 위한 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
